channel.title: PandemoniumScape|Boss|Join now!
channel.description:
[img]http://i40.servimg.com/u/f40/17/60/75/52/pandem11.jpg[/img] [url=http://pandemonium.forums.com.bz]WebSite[/url] [Yes this Works] [url=http://www.rswebclients.com/play/PandemoniumScape]WebClient[/url] [Yes this Works] [u]Client: Soon Coming [70% Done][/u] [marq=up][size=18] Don't forget to [i]Vote[/i] on the [b]Poll[/b] Don't forget to Hit that [i]Thanks[/i] It [i]Helps[/i] [b]alot[/b][/size][/marq]
[i]Colors to what is being done.[/i] [size=18][Green: Done] [Red: Not Done] [Yellow: Coding][/size]
[i]Goals[/i] [spoil] [size=18]Replies Thanks Views
[ul][li]10 [ ]10 [x]10[/li][li]50 [ ]50 [x]50[/li][li]80 [ ]80 [x]80[/li][li]100 [ ]100 [x]100[/li][/ul] [ ]200 [ ]200 [x]200 [ ]500 [ ]500 [x]500 [ ]1000 [ ]1000 [x]1000[/size] [/spoil]
[i]How To Get Ranks[/i]:left: [spoil] [size=18]YouTube-> Make 5 Videos and post them on the forums [Videos must be about the server] Helper-> Help Players on the server Advertiser-> Get 10 players to join the server [ I must know about them joining] Skill Master-> Get all Skills to 135 Donator-> Donator to the server [10$ for stats] Beta Member-> Play in the Beta Forum Helper-> Help Players on the forums Coder-> Help Code the server [You need Skype&Mic] Mod-> Apply on the forums Admin-> Apply on the Forums Member-> You get this for joining the server[/size] [/spoil]
[i]Ranks in the Server[/i]:left: [spoil] [size=18] Owner Co-Owner Hand-Coder System-Coder Coder Hand-Admin Admin Hand-Mod Mod Trial-Mod Best-Helper Head-Helper Helper Beta-Member Skill-Master Member Youtube-Master Youtube Head-Advertiser Best-Advertiser Advertiser Forum-Admin Forum-Mod Forum-Helper Forum-Developer Extreme-Donator Super-Donator Donator-Power Donator More to Come [/size] [/spoil]
[i]Updates that are coming[/i]:left: [spoil] [size=18]New Shops New DonatorZone 2 worlds [s]138 CB[/s] 256! New Skills More Bosses More MiniGames New Custom Capes New Emotes Quests Events Fixing More errors Making Skills 135 <--[+Capes+Emotes] New Max Cape New all 99s cape Beta member Cape Donator Cape Staff Cape More Rare Drops Client New Trees to cut [DreamTrees] Pets More Training zones[/size] [/spoil]
[i]Ranks[/i]:left: [spoil]
[size=18]Owner: Waves Co-Owner: Mikeywheeler Head Admin: Wolf Head Mod: Unsavory Mod: Defet6 Mod: Jampztah [/size] [/spoil]
[i]Youtube Video:[/i]:left: [spoil] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FzpH7dmBj3Q&list=LLWKS15IRevmvat-BHBP_nxg&feature=mh_lolz[/youtube] [/spoil]
[i]About the Server[/i]:left:[spoil][size=18] The Server is 24/7 8Gb Ram Server Just got out of beta MiniGames Skills Bosses PVP&FunPK New Spawn [/size][/spoil]
[i]Apply For Staff[/i]:left: [spoil]
[size=24]>No Staff Hunters< Im not looking for any Staff atm. Age: IGN: How long can you be on: How long have you been on the Server: Have you been staff before [Dont lie]: TimeZone: What do you plain on doing in the server?: ||Ps This can take time||[/size]
[/spoil]
[size=24]Join PandemoniumScape![/size] [u][size=18]Be the one to Master all Skills[/size][/u] :wo

How To Get Ranks:left:
[spoil]
[size=18]YouTube-> Make 5 Videos and post them on the forums [Videos must be about the server]
Helper-> Help Players on the server
Advertiser-> Get 10 players to join the server [ I must know about them joining]
Skill Master-> Get all Skills to 135
Donator-> Donator to the server [10$ for stats]
Beta Member-> Play in the Beta
Forum Helper-> Help Players on the forums
Coder-> Help Code the server [You need Skype&Mic]
Mod-> Apply on the forums
Admin-> Apply on the Forums
Member-> You get this for joining the server[/size]
[/spoil]
